title: How much do you slack when your team is winning pretty hard and scales better?
body:
I was in a ranked game, just trolled around a whole bunch because my team was carrying. I was the jungler, and I fail smited every objective, they stole a dragon and baron, but it was moot because they kept dying.

after a while i just ran at them and auto attacked. they started dying more. eventually we decided to take their nexus....


I litterally did nothing aside from getting top lane rolling, they just picked a shit comp vs a great comp
